name: Hike It
description: Project processed within Digital Academy: Web. The main goal was to use the skills we reached within the course and get some advanced knowledge regarding front-end development-related technologies. Further develop ourselvsed and cooperate in a team of developers, too. Since hiking is one of my passions, project about long-distance trails was the one to pick.
